column1: Deoranian is a town and a nagar panchayat in Bareilly district  in the state of Uttar Pradesh
Deoranian is located at 28.63°N 79.48°E﻿ / 28.63; 79.48. It has an average elevation of 177 metres (580 feet).

column3: 463. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Deoranian has an average literacy rate of 39%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 50% and
column6: 19% of the population is under 6 years of age.
